item.description: Aspire Dance Night Meet Up, invites you to enjoy a great evening of party adventure, romance and dance fun in the Ballroom at the K O C in Salem, Mass. The Dance Party starts at 7:30 PM with mini lessons and instruction that will run through out the evening. Smart casual, jeans OK, all ages, and introductory lesson and dance admission is $10. Singles and Couples are welcome and partners not necessary. We will dance to a variety of music and styles in Latin, partner and line salsa, swing, cha cha, country western, and are open to all ages. Plenty of room on this dance floor so bring lots of your friends to the dance party.
item.how_to_find_us: Aspire is sponsoring the dance in the ballroom.
item.name: Singles and Couples Dance Party, Salem, Ma
